backend/main.mo: Defines social, messaging, job, and coach profile data types with comparison helpers and initializes maps, lists, and mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI overflow‑fix features tied to CoachProfileDetailModal.tsx with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, profile initialization with timeout safeguards, and routing between landing and dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/AdminBadge.tsx: Destructive‑style badge component displaying an admin label with a shield icon.
frontend/src/components/AdminBanner.tsx: Admin‑only alert banner that polls for new notifications and allows dismissal via mutation.
frontend/src/components/CoachDirectory.t: Coach directory with search, follow/unfollow, admin delete actions, profile cards, and modal integration.
frontend/src/components/CoachProfileDeta: Modal displaying detailed coach profiles with tabs, posts, jobs, follow actions, and admin controls including delete operations.
frontend/src/components/EditPostModal.ts: Modal for editing posts, allowing text updates and attachment management before submitting changes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, theme toggling, and user profile avatar with dropdown actions.
frontend/src/components/ImageCropper.tsx: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/JobBoard.tsx: Job board for viewing, posting, applying to, and deleting job listings with admin and form controls.
frontend/src/components/MessagingHub.tsx: Messaging interface for viewing connections, selecting a conversation, and sending direct messages.
frontend/src/components/MyProfile.tsx: Profile page with edit mode, photo handling, and fields for coach details, using queries to load and update profile data.
frontend/src/components/PostAttachmentRe: Renders attachments as images, videos, PDFs, or generic files with download/open actions based on MIME type.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial coach profile setup with photo upload, position/role selectors, and profile submission.
frontend/src/components/SocialFeed.tsx: Main social feed with posts, comments, likes, attachments, admin actions, sorting, and profile lookups.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, photos, and related data via an actor API with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements a tab-based dashboard UI switching between feed, coaches, jobs, messages, and profile views.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, feature cards, and login integration via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON describing the platform’s versioned project state, high-level summary, and a list of existing implemented features with IDs, titles, synonyms, descriptions, and versions.
